quotes.text: A red owl rides a bicycle.
The blue lion bakes chocolate cookies.
A green sheep watches television shows.
The yellow dolphin plays with balloons.
A pink tiger waters the garden.
The orange kangaroo reads comic books.
A purple wolf eats ice cream.
The brown rhinoceros takes photographs daily.
A black squirrel draws with crayons.
The white turtle drives a bus.
A red leopard throws a frisbee.
The blue octopus rides a scooter.
A yellow whale plays board games.
The green cheetah sings in shower.
A pink seal makes paper airplanes.
The orange hamster drinks hot chocolate.
A purple peacock walks the dog.
The brown beaver writes in diary.
A black moose bounces on trampoline.
The white flamingo plays video games.
A red cobra does jumping jacks.
The blue walrus brushes teeth carefully.
A green raccoon flies a kite.
The yellow chipmunk takes a nap.
A pink panther skips rope outside.
The orange otter chews bubble gum.
A purple hedgehog eats popcorn loudly.
The brown pelican paints with watercolors.
A black jaguar listens to music.
The white badger combs hair slowly.
A red ostrich sends text messages.
The blue camel blows soap bubbles.
A yellow porcupine builds sandcastles carefully.
The green koala drinks orange juice.
A pink wombat does homework assignments.
The orange meerkat plants flower seeds.
A purple eagle folds paper origami.
The brown sloth races on rollerblades.
A black hyena plays hopscotch outside.
The white platypus colors coloring books.
A red armadillo makes lemonade stands.
The blue falcon picks fresh apples.
A yellow llama jumps in puddles.
The green gazelle blows birthday candles.
A pink panda flies paper kites.
The orange mole digs for treasure.
A purple lynx counts golden stars.
The brown antelope makes snow angels.
A black dolphin catches butterflies daily.
The white tortoise climbs tall trees.
